Row.Text: All around the world, people of high standings want the best wines in the world. Right now, Kosovo is yet to be on the map for such productions, but we could put efforts to put the nation on the map of the world's finest winemaking... [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE] Must have at least one [ICON_RES_WINE] Resource. [NEWLINE] Must be in the Industrial or Modern era. [NEWLINE] Must be Kosovo. [NEWLINE][ICON_UNCHECKBOX]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_RES_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The amount of [ICON_RES_WINE] wine you have is doubled. Gain a small amount of [ICON_TOURISM] tourism in every city for each worked source of wine.
Kosovo has used their optimal weather to multiply their wineries' yields and has become a major player in the wine industry!

President, in this world, some people claim that Kosovo is a puppet of their empire and that we have no autonomy. I propose that we use these new technologies we have to show that Kosovo is recognized as an independent nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE] Must have at least three DoF Partners. [NEWLINE] Must have researched Computers. [NEWLINE] Must be Kosovo. [NEWLINE][ICON_UNCHECKBOX]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_RES_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain extra Delegates in the World Congress per DOF partner.
You have harnessed the power of computers to establish an online presence, opening kosovothanksyou.com!
Kosovo is grateful for its recognition!
